Headline: #95 95th & #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 95th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: Eastbound #95 95th & #112 Vincennes/111th buses temporarily rerouted via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th, due to police activity near 95th/Wentworth

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th & #112 Vincennes/111th buses temporarily rerouted via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 95th/Wentworth.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
